actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to render judgment upon the claim of John King, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to render judgment upon the claim of a named individual that he was denied a specified promotion in the Navy as a probable consequence of improper and inequitable actions within the Department of the Navy.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the United States Claims Court to render judgment upon the claim of John King, and for other purposes.
